cyclone.name: CRISTOBAL
cyclone.current_location: about 45 miles NW of Ciudad del Carmen, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: Expected to drift east today, then turn north-northeast and move north across the Gulf of Mexico toward the central Louisiana coast by late weekend

weather_observation.watch_coast: N/A for Ottawa; tropical storm watches have not been posted
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning in effect Campeche to Puerto de Veracruz, Mexico
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southern Bay of Campeche coast now, spreading northward toward the U.S. central Gulf Coast later in the period
weather_observation.wind: None expected at Ottawa Port District within the 5-day window
